title: Bloomberg Markets: Steel Looks at the Next Shale Revolution
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Steel Looks at the Next Shale Revolution
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Alix Steel\u0010Anchor \u0010Bloomberg Television \u0010Discussing The Next Shale Revolution airing Wednesday at 9p Wall Street time on Bloomberg Television. The series will examine the history, the players, the environmental issues and the effects on the global oil market.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
